overview: A relatively new series, the Professor Mike's Freshman Fantasies has nonetheless made a resounding name for itself amongst fans of the gonzo genre. This is attributable in no small part to the invariable and obviously authentic ardor felt by the performer, and the always fresh, absolutely stunning young women living out their fantasies here. The heat of the action on tap stems from the fact that these young women are indeed doing decadent deeds they have always wanted to do, and are often doing so after having led very “normal” lives. The ambient eroticism is electric!
title: Freshman Fantasies 5
